title: ‘Dune,’ ‘Spider-Man: No Way Home’ and the Best Trailers of 2021
description:
Sean and Amanda talk about the buzzy new ‘Spider-Man’ trailer, as well as some hotly anticipated awards-season films, including ‘The Power of the Dog’ and ‘Spencer’ (0:31). Then they dig into the mailbag to answer listener questions about ‘Dune,’ their dream biopics, and the HBO Max experiment so far (30:00). Finally, Sean is joined by Michael Sarnoski, the writer-director of the acclaimed Nicolas Cage drama ‘Pig’ (1:20:00).

Hosts: Sean Fennessey and Amanda Dobbins
Guest: Michael Sarnoski
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
